subject: Attn: Glenn. (Acknowledgement From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Attn: Glenn,

This bank writes to inform you that today we received a Deposit certificate
and Death certificate of Late Andreas Schranner by Mr. Steven Albert who
happen to be his account officer before he died in a plane crash, to enable
us proceed for the processing of your fund valued US$21.5 million dollars,
you are advise to forward to this bank a copy of Letter of administration
and Fund ownership certificate from the court so that we will proceed for
the processing of your fund and also Load your fund into an ATM card in
your name without delay.

Yours Faithfully

Mr. Uche Ike.
For United Bank For Africa Group.

                ********************DISCLAIMER*****************

This message is private and confidential and it is intended exclusively for
the addressee. If you receive this message by mistake, you should not
disseminate, distribute or copy this e-mail.Please inform the sender and
delete the message and attachments from your system. No confidentiality or
any privilege regarding the information is waived or lost by any
mis-transmission or malfunction. Any views or opinions contained in this
message are solely those of the author, and do not necessarily represent
those of United Bank for Africa, unless otherwise specifically stated and
the sender is authorized to do so.E-mail transmission cannot be guaranteed
to be secure,confidential, or error-free, as information could be
intercepted, corrupted, lost,destroyed, arrive late, incomplete, or contain
viruses. United Bank for Africa does not accept responsibility for any
changes in the contents of this message after it has been sent. This
message is provided for informational purposes and should not be construed
as a solicitation or offer to buy or sell any securities or related
financial instruments. If the address of this message does not consent to
the use of internet e-mail, please communicate it to us.

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (Acknowledgement From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about the late Andreas Schranner and his unfortunate demise in a plane crash. 

I'm curious, how did you come across my contact information in relation to this case? Also, could you please provide more details about the process of obtaining the Letter of Fund ownership from the court?

I appreciate your assistance and look forward to hearing back from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Attn: Glenn,

This bank acknowledges the receipt of your email, We came across your
contact information through your account officer here in our bank Mr.
Steven Albert who happen to be Late Andreas Schranner account officer
before he died in a plane crash and also still standing as your account
officer as you are now the next of kin to Late Andreas Schranner to claim
his fund as his next of kin.

Finally, in regards to the obtaining of the Letter of Fund ownership
certificate and Letter Administration from the court, you are to contact
your account officer Mr. Steven Albert he is in a position to explain to
you how to process those documents and where to obtain them, Remember those
2 documents when obtain will make you real next of kin to Late Andreas
Schranner because without those 2 documents present to this bank there is
no way the bank or management will proved you next of kin to Late Andreas
Schranner so is very important you send them to us when obtained from the
court to enable us proceed for the processing and Loading of your funds
into an ATM card in your name without delay.

Yours Faithfully

Mr. Uche Ike.
For United Bank For Africa Group.

                ********************DISCLAIMER*****************

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm sorry to hear about the unfortunate incident involving Late Andreas Schranner. 

I understand that I need to obtain a Letter of Fund Ownership and a Letter from the court to prove my kinship with Late Andreas Schranner. Could you please provide more details on how I can process these documents? 

Also, could you explain more about the ATM card that will be loaded with funds? How does this work exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Attn: Glenn,

This bank acknowledges the receipt of your email, You can process or obtain
the Fund Ownership certificate and the Letter of administration at the
court through a Lawyer who will go to the court to secure the 2
certificates in your name at the court that will prove you the next of kin
to Late Andreas Schranner before our bank management or you can write to
Mr. Steven Albert as your account officer, He can also direct you on how to
obtain the 2 certificates and Be informed that your information will be
needed to obtain the 2 certificates at court, such as your full names and
your full contact address.

Yours Faithfully

Mr. Uche Ike.
For United Bank For Africa Group.

                ********************DISCLAIMER*****************

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message, could you please clarify? 

You mentioned something about obtaining the Fund Ownership and the Letter at the court through a lawyer. Could you explain more about this process? How does one go about securing these documents?

Also, you mentioned Mr. Steven Albert as my account officer. Could you tell me more about his role and how he can assist me in this matter?

I appreciate your help in understanding these matters better.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for your detailed email. I appreciate the information about the Fund Ownership and Letter from the court. It's interesting to know that a lawyer can secure these in my name, proving me as the next of kin to Late Andreas Schranner.

I'm curious about this process though. Could you please explain more about how it works? How does one go about securing a lawyer for this purpose? And what exactly is involved in obtaining these documents?

Also, I'm glad to hear that the ATM card works just like any other ATM card. That certainly makes things easier! But could you tell me more about how it's set up? Is there a specific bank or ATM machine I need to use?

Lastly, I understand that this message is private and confidential, and I assure you that I will respect that confidentiality.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Attn: Glenn,

This bank acknowledges the receipt of your email, Sorry you do not have to
be confused about my message to you is a very simple process.

Concerning the obtaining of the Fund Ownership and the Letter at the court
through a lawyer, yes the lawyer has to go to the court to obtain the 2
documents on your behalf and the letter of administration from court will
confirm you as the new rightful person who have the right to receive the
fund as his new next of kin on the content of the letter in the document,
is a due process and that is why I suggest that you contact Mr. Steven
Albert because he is the account officer to deceased your relative and also
your account officer as the new next of kin, He is the one that presented
the Deposit certificate and the Death certificate to our bank on your
behalf which made us to request that you provide this 2 documents to us
which makes you next of kin before the management and his role is to guide
you and also direct you on how to secure this 2 documents from the court,
is a very simple process all you need is his guidance and directions.



Yours Faithfully

Mr. Uche Ike.
For United Bank For Africa Group.

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, it's a bit overwhelming for me but I'm trying my best to understand the process.

So, if I understood correctly, Mr. Steven Albert is the account officer who will guide me through this process of obtaining the Fund Ownership and Letter from the court? And this letter will confirm me as the new rightful person to receive the fund?

Could you please explain a bit more about what exactly these documents are and why they are necessary? Also, how does one typically contact Mr. Steven Albert?

I appreciate your patience with my questions.

Best wishes,
Glenn

subject: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Attn: Glenn,

This bank acknowledges the receipt of your email, yes correct, Mr. Steven
Albert is your account officer who will guide you through this process of
obtaining the Fund Ownership and Letter from the court And this letter will
confirm you as the new rightful person to receive the fund.

We believe when you obtain the 2 documents from the court, you will
understand the contents when you go through them is very simple thing, you
can contact Mr. Steven Albert in his email address:
stevenalbert826@yahoo.com but you suppose to have his contact because
before he presented the Deposit certificate and the Death certificate to us
you must have been in contact with him but all the same you can go ahead
contact him for the obtaining of the 2 documents from the court which makes
you the next of kin to deceased.


Yours Faithfully

Mr. Uche Ike.
For United Bank For Africa Group.

subject: Re: Attn: Glenn. (In Regards To Your Email Received From United From United Bank For Africa Group)
body:
Hello Mr. Uche Ike,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information. It's great to know that Mr. Steven Albert will be guiding me through this process.

I'm a bit confused though, as I don't recall having been in contact with Mr. Albert before he presented the Deposit and Death to you. Could you please clarify how this happened? 

Also, could you provide me with his email address so I can get in touch with him regarding obtaining the documents from the court?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Glenn
